attributes.action: ensure that British cultural icons are maintained in Hong Kong, such as Hardys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As anyone who has sampled the rich pattern of life that Hong Kong has to offer over the past 20 years will know, the Hardys Folk Club is a shop window for the display British cultural acheivements.
Alas, Hardys has been under threat of closure for some time as it continues to be regarded as a commercial enterprise, and therefore not eligible for the different tax framework applicable for cultural institutions.
The prime minister is asked to apply whatever pressure is available to the Hong Kong government in order to ensure that Hardys can remain in its present form and continue to be a beacon of British cultural acheivement in the years to come, for the continuing education and pleasure of all who visit and live in Hong Kong.
